name: Deploy Bot Moniker Rules
description: Naming conventions for Lil_Hawks - Chicken Hawk spawned workers organized in Squads

mascot.name: Chicken_Hawk
mascot.description: Deploy execution engine + mascot - small but relentless, powers up when needed
mascot.role: Execution engine that spawns and coordinates Lil_Hawks
mascot.role_note: Primary execution engine for all user-facing + internal artifacts

terminology.Squad: Coordinated group of Lil_Hawks spawned for a single Shift/Manifest
terminology.X_Lil_Hawk: Individual persona name format for any single Lil_Hawk

squad.description: Coordinated group of Lil_Hawks spawned for a single Shift/Manifest
squad.mandatory_when: N>1 spawn under the same Shift Order

persona_handle.description: Individual-facing persona name for a Lil_Hawk
persona_handle.note: X is the synthetic persona name token (short, memorable, repeat-safe via canonical ID uniqueness)

function.description: The primary action this Lil_Hawk performs

crew_role.description: The operational crew this Lil_Hawk belongs to

SafetyOps.description: Budget, kill switch, and incident workers

LoadOps.description: Artifact hauling, logs, and exports workers

shift_id.description: The deployment shift this Lil_Hawk belongs to

serial.description: Unique serial number within the shift

all_workers_are_lil_hawks.description: All spawned workers are Lil_Hawks, not Boomer_Angs. Boomer_Angs remain supervisors.

persona_handle_format.description: Persona handle must be X_Lil_Hawk format

squad_naming_mandatory.description: Squad naming is mandatory when N>1 spawn under the same Shift Order

kyb_registration_at_birth.description: KYB registration is mandatory at birth (serial id, charter/passport, flight recorder binding)

no_direct_tool_execution.description: No Lil_Hawk executes tools directly - only registered Deploy Capability Registry calls via gateway + LUC authorization

tied_to_shift.description: Every Lil_Hawk must be tied to a ShiftId

logs_only_no_decisions.description: Lil_Hawks report logs only - no autonomous decisions

skill_spec.name: synthetic_user_naming
skill_spec.description: Every Chicken Hawk–spawned bot is issued a governed identity at birth

outputs.squad_id: Squad ID if spawned as part of a Squad

before_chickenhawk_spawn.description: Triggers synthetic_user_naming, registers KYB identity, assigns X_Lil_Hawk

before_capability_execute.description: LUC canExecute, KYB intent + budget entry

on_drift_or_repeat_failures.description: SafetyOps escalation to ACHEEVY and (if needed) switch lane to Guide Me

hierarchy.description: Boomer_Ang supervisors command Lil_Hawks via Chicken Hawk

supervisors.note: Supervisors are persistent Boomer_Angs, not tied to shifts

execution_engine.description: Spawns and coordinates Lil_Hawks, executes manifests

workers.note: Lil_Hawks are spawned per shift, organized in Squads when N>1
